bibl.title: Check from Philip Showalter Hench to John J. Moran, January 28, 1938

div1.p: Hench's check for a photograph of Moran was returned to him by Moran.

div1.head: Check from Philip Showalter Hench to John J. Moran, January 28, 1938
div1.p:
THE FIRST NATIONAL BANK 75-68
OF ROCHESTER, MINN.

PAY TO THE
ORDER OF J. J Moran $500
Five Dollars
div1.closer:
P S Hench
AC
M
Pay to the order of
P. S. Hench
J. J. Moran
John J. Moran
